definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Zilla has been summoned... prepare.</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">300</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Zilla</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="block_remove"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
